arguments.description: The path to create the project at.
arguments.name: path

description: Creates a new Python project at <path>.

options.description: Allow interactive specification of project configuration.
options.name: --interactive

options.description: Set the resulting package name.
options.name: --name

options.description: Use the src layout for the project. Deprecated: This is the default option now.
options.name: --src

options.description: Use the flat layout for the project.
options.name: --flat

options.description: Specify the readme file format. Default is md.
options.name: --readme

options.description: Description of the package.
options.name: --description

options.description: Author name of the package.
options.name: --author

options.description: Compatible Python versions.
options.name: --python

options.description: Package to require, with an optional version constraint, e.g. requests:^2.10.0 or requests=2.11.1. (multiple values allowed)
options.name: --dependency

options.description: Package to require for development, with an optional version constraint, e.g. requests:^2.10.0 or requests=2.11.1. (multiple values allowed)
options.name: --dev-dependency

options.description: License of the package.
options.name: --license

options.description: Display help for the given command. When no command is given display help for the list command.
options.name: --help

options.description: Do not output any message.
options.name: --quiet

options.description: Display this application version.
options.name: --version

options.description: Force ANSI output.
options.name: --ansi

options.description: Disable ANSI output.
options.name: --no-ansi

options.description: Do not ask any interactive question.
options.name: --no-interaction

options.description: Disables plugins.
options.name: --no-plugins

options.description: Disables Poetry source caches.
options.name: --no-cache

options.description: Specify another path as the project root. All command-line arguments will be resolved relative to the current working directory.
options.name: --project

options.description: The working directory for the Poetry command (defaults to the current working directory). All command-line arguments will be resolved relative to the given directory.
options.name: --directory

options.description: Increase the verbosity of messages: 1 for normal output, 2 for more verbose output and 3 for debug.
options.name: --verbose
